謤字的基本解释

謤
biāo
言有所止。

謤字的汉语字典释义

[①]［biāo］
［《集韻》卑遥切，平宵，幫。］
［《集韻》紕招切，平宵，滂。］
言有所止。
[②]［piāo］
言语声轻。

謤字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　謤； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1177第04
【集韻】【類篇】??遙切，音猋。言有所止也。　又【集韻】【類篇】?紕招切，音漂。言輕也。　【正字通】本作〈言?〉。

謤字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
謤字的起名意思

暂无。

謤
Basic explanation of words
謤
biāo
The words have stopped.
謤
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［biāo］
["Jiyun" cut away from a low level, at night, help. ]
["Ji Yun" 纰Zhao cut, flat night, punishing. ]
The words have stopped.
[②]［piāo］
The speech is soft.
謤
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [Words Department] 　謤; Kangxi strokes: 18; Page number: page 1177 04
[Ji Yun] [Class Chapter]?? Remote cut, sound 猋. The words have stopped.　[Jiyun] [Class Chapter]? The sound drifts. The words are light.　【Zhengzitong】This is "Speech?".
謤
